document.full_text: the lawyer for the new york hotel maid who accused dominique strauss-kahn of trying to rape her has appealed on french television for other women with claims against the former imf chief to come forward.
document.title: strauss-kahn maid's lawyer appeals for other victims
lines_and_colors: the lawyer for the new york hotel maid who accused dominique strauss-kahn of trying to rape her has appealed on french television for other women with claims against the former imf chief to come forward.
